nodes.text: A heavy weapons repulsorlift platoon was a formation in the Imperial Army.

Arranged similarly to a standard repulsorlift platoon, a heavy weapons repulsorlift platoon comprised four heavy weapons repulsorlift squads, a command element, and a support vehicle. A heavy weapons repulsorlift platoon could be augmented by the addition of four extra heavy weapons repulsorlift squads.
